task.title: Edit Participant
task.shortdesc: Edit a participant for a session.

step.cmd: Select an existing participant's name and click the Edit Participant button to the right.
step.stepresult: The Edit Participant window will appear.

step.cmd: Edit the participant's Name, Birthday, Language, Group, Gender, Education and Role as you see fit and click Ok.
step.stepresult: Any changes to the participant's name or age will be reflected in the Session Information view.
